item.title: 南非央行在大选阴影下维持利率不变
item.description: 南非央行维持借贷成本不变，在该国举行关键选举一天后做出了人们普遍期待的裁决。【原文：South Africa’s central bank left borrowing costs unchanged, delivering the widely expected verdict one day after the nation held pivotal elections.】

item.title: 土耳其加息无虞，消费者仍在推动经济发展
item.description: 今年年初，土耳其的经济增长速度可能会加快，因为消费者推动了经济扩张，而迄今为止，土耳其的经济扩张一直没有受到旨在抑制国内需求的一系列激进加息措施的影响。【原文：Turkey’s economy likely grew faster to start the year, as consumers propel an expansion that’s so far been immune to a series of aggressive interest-rate increases meant to muffle domestic demand.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空在近期事件后增加湍流检测工具
item.description: 在其他航空公司发生两起导致一死数十伤的重大事故后，阿联酋航空正在增加一些工具，帮助航空公司预防极端气流事故。【原文：Emirates is adding tools to help the airline prevent incidents of extreme turbulence, after two high-profile mishaps on other carriers left one dead and dozens injured.】

item.title: 瑞银因未报告与也门有关的账户而被瑞士银行罚款
item.description: 瑞银集团因未报告与也门前总统阿里-阿卜杜拉-萨利赫有关的涉嫌洗钱案件，被瑞士当局罚款 5 万瑞士法郎（5.5 万美元）。【原文：UBS AG has been fined 50,000 Swiss francs ($55,000) by Swiss authorities for failing to report cases of suspected money laundering linked to the ex-president of Yemen, Ali Abdullah Saleh.】

item.description:

item.title: 阿尔及利亚即将与雪佛龙达成协议，誓言继续成为欧洲主要天然气供应商
item.description: 阿尔及利亚即将与美国能源巨头雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp）签署一项协议，因为这个欧佩克成员国的目标是增加天然气勘探和生产，并继续成为欧洲的主要天然气供应国。【原文：Algeria is close to signing a deal with US energy giant Chevron Corp as the OPEC member aims to increase natural gas exploration and production and remain a key supplier of the fuel to Europe.】

item.title: 裁员、定价能力推动 S&P 500 利润创 16 年最高水平
item.description: 受裁员、商品价格下降和持续定价能力的推动，S&P 500 强企业的盈利能力有望超过十多年来的水平。【原文：S&P 500 companies are on track to be more profitable than they have been in over a decade, boosted by layoffs, lower commodity prices and continued pricing power.】

item.title: 英国最富有人群受通胀和高利率影响最大
item.description: 英国最富有的家庭首当其冲地受到了通胀加剧和高利率的影响，这扭转了早先最贫困家庭受挤压最严重的趋势。【原文：Britain’s richest households are bearing the brunt of stickier inflation and high interest rates, a reversal of earlier trends when the poorest was squeezed hardest.】

item.title: 津巴布韦将就 190 亿美元债务向债权人寻求 "大幅减持
item.description: 津巴布韦希望大幅降低其累计欠款达 192 亿美元的债权人的债务价值，以此作为重整拖欠债务的努力的一部分。【原文：Zimbabwe wants steep reductions in debt values from creditors whom it cumulatively owes $19.2 billion, as part of efforts to reorganize arrears that are a weight on the economy.】

item.title: 销售稳定，Foot Locker 扭亏为盈迹象显现
item.description: Foot Locker 公司公布的盈利超出预期，这家运动鞋零售商正试图重拾其扭亏为盈计划的步伐。【原文：Foot Locker Inc. reported earnings that surpassed expectations as the sneaker retailer tries to get back on pace with its turnaround plan.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。由于对降息的押注减少，美国股市继续承压，而 Salesforce 在发布不温不火的销售预测后暴跌。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. US stocks remain under pressure from diminishing bets on interest-rate cuts, while Salesforce plunges following a tepid sales forecast. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行资本市场部门利润大增，超出预期
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行因资本市场业务表现强劲和潜在贷款损失准备金低于预期而超出分析师预期。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada beat analysts’ estimates on strong performance from the company’s capital-markets business and lower-than-expected provisions for potential loan losses.】

item.title: 英国银行连续六周向英国央行申请创纪录现金
item.description: 英国银行扩大了对英格兰银行现金的创纪录申购，以补充因政策制定者继续出售多年来通过量化宽松政策获得的债券而流失的流动性。【原文：UK banks extended their record bid for cash from the Bank of England, replacing liquidity which is being drained as policymakers continue to sell bonds acquired through years of quantitative easing.】

item.title: 欧盟同意从 7 月起提高俄罗斯谷物进口关税
item.description: 欧盟同意提高进口俄罗斯谷物的关税，以遏制克里姆林宫的收入，并防止这些货物破坏该地区农业部门的稳定。【原文：The European Union agreed to hike tariffs on imports of Russian grain to curb the Kremlin’s revenues and prevent those shipments from destabilizing the region’s farm sector.】

item.title: 国内生产总值和通胀数据公布前，国债在大跌后保持稳定
item.description: 由于投资者在等待美国经济增长和通胀数据对经济状况做出更多说明，周四国债全线上涨，缩减了本周的大幅跌幅。【原文：Treasuries gained across the curve on Thursday, trimming this week’s sharp losses as investors waited for US growth and inflation data to shed more light on the state of the economy.】

item.title: Cevian 创始人称瑞士资本要求损害瑞银稳定性
item.description: 瑞银集团的一位主要激进投资者表示，瑞士提出的大幅提高瑞银集团资本要求的建议将对该银行的稳定和国家利益产生反作用。【原文：Switzerland’s proposal to significantly increase capital requirements for UBS Group AG will be counterproductive for the bank’s stability and the country’s interests, according to a major activist investor in the bank.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行拨备低于预期，业绩超出预期
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）为可能出现的贷款损失预留的资金少于预期，因而超出了分析师的预期。【原文：Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce beat analysts’ estimates as it set aside less money than expected for possible loan losses.】

item.title: 欧元区经济信心增强，复苏势头加强
item.description: 随着欧元区从去年下半年的温和衰退中反弹，该地区的经济信心有所增强。【原文：Euro-area economic confidence improved as the region bounces back from its mild recession in the second half of last year.】

item.title: 路透社称中国人民银行将在必要时出售政府债券
item.description: 据路透社周四报道，中国人民银行表示已准备好在必要时出售包括国债在内的低风险债券。【原文：The People’s Bank of China said it’s ready to sell low-risk bonds — including government debt — when necessary, Reuters reported Thursday, reigniting a debate over whether the central bank is preparing to enter the bond market for the first time in years.】

item.title: 德国将于 2025 年取消备受争议的天然气存储税
item.description: 德国将从明年 1 月起取消在其边境征收天然气储存税，因为捷克共和国等中欧国家表示，这将损害它们为摆脱俄罗斯天然气所做的努力。【原文：Germany will scrap a gas storage levy at its border from next January after central European states like the Czech Republic said it would harm their efforts to ditch Russian gas.】

item.title: 非洲开发银行称，东非经济反弹将引领非洲大陆 2024 年的增长
item.description: 根据非洲开发银行的预测，东非将在今明两年反弹成为非洲大陆增长最快的地区。【原文：East Africa will bounce back to be the continent’s fastest growing region this year and next, according to the African Development Bank’s projections.】

item.title: 中国房地产和科技股跌至熊市里程碑
item.description: 中国的科技股和地产股正处于技术性调整的边缘，使人们对中国股市近期反弹的可持续性产生怀疑。【原文：China’s technology and property shares are on the brink of a technical correction, raising doubts over the sustainability of a recent rebound in the country’s equities.】

item.title: 日本为开发澳大利亚天然气项目提供 10 亿美元贷款
item.description: 日本将向伍德赛德能源集团有限公司（Woodside Energy Group Ltd.）提供 10 亿美元贷款，用于在澳大利亚开发天然气项目，这是亚洲能源进口国为确保数十年化石燃料供应而采取的又一举措。【原文：Japan will provide Woodside Energy Group Ltd. a $1 billion loan to develop a natural gas project in Australia, another move by the Asian energy importer to ensure the supply of fossil fuel for decades.】

item.title: 炙热气温促进印度天然气使用，闲置工厂重新启动
item.description: 据印度首都的一家主要燃料供应商称，由于一些闲置的发电厂重新启动以满足日益增长的电力需求，闷热的天气使印度的天然气需求比一年前增加了多达 12%。【原文：Sweltering heat has raised gas demand in India by as much as 12% from a year ago as some idle power plants have restarted to cater to growing electricity needs, according to a major supplier of the fuel in India’s capital.】
